heroSection.title:
Patronat
de festes de
heroSection.description: Everything you need to know about the festivals in Roquetes is just a click away.

aboutSection.title: Who are we?
aboutSection.description: The Patronat de Festes de Roquetes is an independent, apolitical, non-profit organization responsible for organizing festivals and events for the town of Roquetes in Tarragona. Here you can find all the information about upcoming events and much more.

wantToParticipateSection.title: Do you want to participate?
wantToParticipateSection.firstPar: There are many ways to help and participate in setting up festivals and events that take place throughout the year.
wantToParticipateSection.secondPar: You can participate by becoming a member of the association and enjoy all the events of the year, which also includes entry to the villageâ€™s main festivals every year.
wantToParticipateSection.thirdPar: If you have a group of friends, you can also participate by registering as a crew in the crew competition that takes place every year.
wantToParticipateSection.linksPar: Click here to see the requirements to participate in the crew competition or here to register as a member.
